com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter

Class Plotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.plotter.Plotter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossCursorPlotter, DataPlotter, DrawingPlotter, HorizontalAxisPlotter, VerticalAxisPlotter

    public class Plotter
extends java.lang.Object
    Base abstract class of all plotter subclasses. Note that the frame for the plot data must have been calculated by a call to PlotData.calculateFrame prior to any plot operation, except for those repaints in a small clip bounds that do not modify the frame maximum and minimum.

    This base plotter primarily offers the methods to calculate coordinates from values and values from coordinates.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas
